attributes.action: Stop taxing businesses, we need business owners to be motivated to continue
attributes.additional_details: We need to change the Government's attitude towards taxing businesses. Compulsory workplace pensions hit our bottom line - and this doesn't improve staff turnover rates. When you increase business rates - we end up paying ourselves less. Increasing tax to the self employed - we end up taking less money home. When you force the national living wage - we end up paying more for low skilled people through no fault of our own. Remind me why I should struggle when I take on all the pressure?
attributes.background: I own a small business. I employ nearly 50 people. Most of my employees earn more than I pay myself. I don't feel motivated to be self-employed and the government appears to believe that taxing businesses more is the solution. Very short sighted! Help business owners earn more and they will grow.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about the effect of taxes on business, but we're not sure what changes you'd like to see. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
